text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn On average 7,700 DIE EVERY SINGLE DAY! Guess what the #1 killer is....heart disease! NOT COVID19 which won’t even come close when we count the entire WORLD! You don’t report on that daily so yeah, this Flynn thing is a NEWS WORTHY story but then again you aren’t a journalist so🤷‍♀️
